name: The Universal Language
description:
VERY IMPORTANT : The "try again" button seems to be buggy and brings you back to the first level. If you want to play other levels,  there is a LEVEL SELECT menu.

Make him stay inside of the air capsules or he will die of asphyxiation ! But wait, he doesn't answer to the keyboard controls ? How will you communicate with him. Wouldn't it be nice if there was some sort of universal language that anybody can understand?
